content: l only r13 sl1 k16 ssk k1 turn r14 sl1 p17 p2tog p1 turn r15 sl1 k18 ssk turn r16 sl1 p18 p2tog ribbed socks more at https //yarn crafter-app com page 2 part of the crafter companions series of mobile apps all sizes 14 16 18 20 sts remain sl1 k6 7 8 9 to middle of heel pm this is the new start of round gusset k7 8 9 10 heel sts pick up and k9 11 13 15 sts along edge of heel flap plus 1 extra st between heel flap and instep pm place 24 28 32 36 held instep sts on needle st in pattern across these sts pm pick up 1 extra st between heel flap and instep pick up and k9 11 13 15 sts along edge of heel flap k7 8 9 10 sts to the start of round marker sm r1 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k in pattern to next marker sm k1 ssk k to start of round marker r2 k to marker sm k in pattern to next marker sm k to start of round marker work r1-r2 until 48 56 64 72 sts remain foot continue working sole sts in stockinette and instep sts in pattern until foot is 7 5 8 8 5 9 19 20 22 23 cm or 1 25 1 5 2 2 25 3 4 5 6 cm shorter than desired length toe r1 k r2 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to start of round repeat r1-r2 until 24 28 32 36 sts remain repeat r2 until 12 14 16 20 sts remain knit to 1st marker cut yarn leaving 18 46 cm long tail graft the toe using the kitchener stitch and weave in all ends ribbed socks more at https //yarn crafter-app com page 3 part of the crafter companions series of mobile apps
